titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 4) to grant the power to the President to reduce budget authority, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-121, by Mr. Goss.

Rule provides for consideration of S. 4 with 1 hour of general debate. Motion to recommit allowed. Making in order a motion to take the bill from the Speaker's table, and to strike all after the enacting clause and insert the text of H.R. 2 as passed by the House.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 49.

bill.summary: 5/16/1995--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 4 (granting the President legislative line item veto rescission authority).
